description: This file implements utility functions for the SLAP (Service Logic Aggregation Plane) component, specifically for setting up object property and method descriptor tables, and registering service calls within the Cisco RDK architecture. It contains functions for initializing internal tables and handling registration of method descriptors, including managing object properties related to method calls.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOeoSetupOpoTable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the object property table for the SLAP object entity, allocating memory for the table and initializing each header.

parameters.name: hThisObject
parameters.description: Pointer to the SLAP object entity instance.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOeoSetupMdoTable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the method descriptor table for the SLAP object entity, allocating memory and initializing headers.

parameters.name: hThisObject
parameters.description: Pointer to the SLAP object entity instance.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOeoRegisterCall(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCallDescriptor)
methods.description: Registers a service call, creating and configuring method descriptors, object properties, and associating them with appropriate method IDs and properties.

parameters.name: hThisObject
parameters.description: Pointer to the SLAP object entity instance.

parameters.name: hCallDescriptor
parameters.description: Pointer to the call descriptor to register.
